name: Dancing Stage: featuring True Kiss Destination
description:
Dancing Stage: featuring True Kiss Destination is the first Dance Dance Revolution spin-off game released only in Japan from Konami with songs of the Japanese music group called True Kiss Destination and Konami original songs as well.

The gameplay consists in the same arrow stepping at right timing along the music as the original DDR games, the PlayStation version features game modes such as arcade (the original conversion of the arcade game), event mode (exclusive console version), free dance mode (to play as the workout/diet mode) and training/edit mode (to practice tricky steps and edit your custom steps and store them in a memory card).
